text: The 1966 Ballon d'Or was the 11th Ballon d'Or awarded. It was won by Manchester United midfielder Bobby Charlton. ==Rankings== Rank Name Club Nationality Points 1 Bobby Charlton Manchester United 81 2 Eusébio S.L.
